queries.query: huge worm-like monster that lives in water and has psychic abilities
queries.variant: huge monster that looks like a worm and dwells in water with psychic powers

queries.query: monster with high hit points that can swim and constrict enemies
queries.variant: creature with lots of hit points able to swim and grip foes

queries.query: aberration with maddening whispers that affects nearby creatures
queries.variant: creature categorized as aberration with confusing whispers impacting creatures near it

queries.query: strong monster capable of grappling and delivering psychic damage
queries.variant: powerful creature that can restrain foes and inflict psychic harm

queries.query: creature that can traverse both land and water and has average dexterity
queries.variant: a being that moves well on both land and in water but is average in agility
